metadata.title: CVE-2020-19143 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow in LibTiff v4.0.10 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice via the "TIFFVGetField" funtion in the component'libtiff/tif_dir.c'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-19143` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.4
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.4
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.4
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.4').
